Yanshosh,  Squizzy is with LadyHawk in the Allince base.  Spears, 
last I knew, was in the ark, strapped down to a table by Firearm.  If 
the ark was destroyed, then she would still be inside it.  Correct me 
if this is wrong.))




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Anyone knows any nuclear launch codes? I need 'em for Qwest's 
demise.
> 
> Logo, Squizzy is at the CF, not the Ark. The CF is the Maximal 
base, a battle 
> cruiser, and it probably wouldn't have collapsing walls or 
rooms.... I'll go 
> along with it if you insist, but its very strange.
> 
> And everyone at the Ark, there a battle going on!!
> 
> ::Ramulus/Slayer/Smokescreen/Proto::
> 
> Seeing bots fly toward the Ark, and his scanners reporting that 
they were 
> Predacons, Proto opens fire, aiming at Destructor with one gun and 
Cerebrus 
> with the other.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus swears, watching bot after bot aproach the Ark, and Proto 
open fire. 
> He'd have to talk to the bot about opening fire like that, if they 
survived 
> this that is.
> 
> Aiming carefully, he fires a few shots at Destructor.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing Ramulus and Proto open fire, Smokescreen follows suit, 
firing on 
> Destructor.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Slayer growls as Lunarping tackles him, Slayer's jetpack doubling 
its power 
> and sending the two bots flying up into the air, Slayer firing two 
shots from 
> his shoulders at point-blank range.
